data.description:
Graffiti Legend is a unique spray simulator engine.
Create unique and digital high quality graffiti and art pieces.

Imagine having a 4-story building to yourself to create art! With GraffCity, you can make digital masterpieces in massive 4096x2048 and 8192x8192 (8K) resolutions. Just remember, these stunning creations can be quite large files, so make sure you have plenty of storage space.

Become a real digital GRAFFITI LEGEND artist
